As you walk through the gloomy tunnels of Submission, keeping an eye out for any sign of danger, you suddenly spot what appears to be an unopened cardboard box, dropped to one side of a rubbish pile. Stepping over towards it, you don't see any sign of a trap or ambush, so, curious as to what could be inside, you tear off the sealing tape and open the lid.

Just as you'd hoped, the package doesn't appear to have been opened before, and with no sign of its intended recipient in sight, you decide that there'd be no harm in taking the contents. Inside, you find...

A large stone building, spanning the entire width of the tunnel, has been erected here. A sign reading 'Official Enforcer Post' is clearly displayed beside the main entrance, and within, a dozen or so Enforcers are manning desks or standing guard beside internal doorways. None of them seem to pay you much attention, allowing you to come and go as you please.

As usual, you see the short, busty form of the cat-girl Enforcer, Claire, hurrying around as she fetches and delivers all sorts of miscellaneous paperwork. If you wanted to, you could approach her and ask for some more information about Submission.

A sign reading 'Official Enforcer Post' is clearly displayed beside the main entrance, and within, a dozen or so Enforcers are manning desks or standing guard beside internal doorways. None of them seem to pay you much attention, allowing you to come and go as you please.

As usual, you see the short, busty form of the cat-girl Enforcer, Claire, hurrying around as she fetches and delivers all sorts of miscellaneous paperwork. As she catches sight of you, she lets out a little cry and waves her arms to get your attention, causing her massive breasts to bounce up and down in a hypnotic rhythm. Skipping over to where you're standing, and causing her tits to jiggle up and down in the process, the busty cat-girl bluntly asks, [claire.speech(Hey, [pc.name], you know that business you got mixed up in down at the Rat Warrens? Did you meet a nasty little rat-boy called 'Murk' while you were in there?)]

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_murkIntroduced)) Having met Murk while in there, you reply to Claire's question in the positive, before asking her what this is all about. #ELSE Not having met anyone called 'Murk' while in there, you reply to Claire's question in the negative, before asking her what this is all about. #ENDIF

[claire.speech(Well, as we discovered as we cleared out the place, that nasty little rat had kidnapped four humans from Dominion. We'd had them on our missing persons list for so long that we'd given up ever finding them,)] she reveals, before letting out a sigh and allowing an uncharacteristically sad look to settle on her face. As you state that surely it's a good thing that these people were found, the cat-girl shakes her head and reveals, [claire.speech(That rat really messed their heads up. All they keep asking for is to be put back into chains and milked while being treated as sex slaves. We've had one of our demon Enforcers who specialises in psychological damage take a look at them, but she said that there's nothing we can do with the limited budget that our department has.)]

Wanting to know what the point is that Claire's getting to, you ask the cat-girl what's going to become of these captives, and what she wants you to do about it.

[claire.speech(Well, the four of them kept on demanding to be made slaves and sold to someone who'd give them the sort of degrading life they've grown to love,)] Claire sighs, the frustration in her voice making it clear that she doesn't approve of this. Throwing her hands up in the air, she reveals, [claire.speech(My superior said that we don't have the time or resources to do anything else with them, so they've been enslaved, transferred to slaver alley, and are due to be auctioned off at the end of the day. Look, I know that I don't owe them anything, and neither do you, but I don't want them being sold to someone who's going to abuse them. I know that you'd treat them right, so I can arrange it for you to take ownership of them instead. It won't cost you anything, either!)]

With that, the busty cat-girl gives you a pleading expression, and you wonder whether to agree to take on these four slaves, or to instead decline and let them be sold off to the highest bidder...

Not wanting to take on these four ex-captives, you tell Claire that you're not able to take ownership of them.

[claire.speech(That's too bad...)] Claire laments, before forcing herself to smile and declare, [claire.speech(Well, I'd better get back on with work! If you need anything, just let me know!)]

With that, the busty cat-girl skips off, leaving you to continue on your way...

Liking the sound of what it is that Claire's suggesting, you tell the cat-girl that you'd be happy to take ownership of the humans who were rescued from the Rat Warrens.

[claire.speech(Great! I knew I could rely on you, [pc.name],)] Claire happily replies, before stating, [claire.speech(All I need is to see your slaver license, then I can get the paperwork signed right away!)]

Producing the piece of paper which she's asking for, you allow Claire to inspect your license, and after she's satisfied, she quickly fills in the paperwork and declares, [claire.speech(That's that all sorted then! Your new slaves will be waiting for you in the administration building in slaver alley.)]

Thanking Claire for the opportunity and for the new slaves, you tell her that the four humans are going to be safe in your hands. Flashing you a big smile, the busty cat-girl bounces up and down, causing her massive breasts to sway as she exclaims, [claire.speech(Thanks again for helping out, [pc.name]; I really didn't want such vulnerable people auctioned off to the public. Anyway, I'd better get back on with work! If you need anything, just let me know!)]

With that, the busty cat-girl skips off, leaving you to continue on your way...

Wanting to talk with Claire, you approach the short cat-girl messenger and call out a greeting in order to get her attention.

#IF(claire.isVisiblyPregnant()) #IF(!claire.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc)) [claire.speech(Oh, [pc.name], look!)] Claire excitedly exclaims as she sees that it's you who's calling out to her. Pointing down to her swollen belly, she continues, [claire.speech(You got me pregnant! Isn't that so exciting?! We're gonna have a kid together!)]

Responding in the positive, you let the happy cat-girl take your [pc.hands] in hers, and you can't help but smile as she gets you to feel her pregnant bump. Concerned with the sort of work she's being asked to perform while pregnant, you ask, [pc.speech(Is there anything I can do to help? They're not making you work too hard here, are they?)]

[claire.speech(Oh, no, don't worry about me!)] she happily replies, [claire.speech(I can always switch over to a desk job for a few days if all the running around gets too much for me. So, anyway, what can I do for you?)] #ELSE [claire.speech(Oh, hello again, [pc.name]!)] Claire cheerfully exclaims as she sees that it's you who's calling out to her. Pointing down to her still-swollen belly, she insists on getting you to run your hands over it as she purrs, [claire.speech(I'm still pregnant with our kid, isn't that so exciting?! So, anyway, what can I do for you this time?)] #ENDIF #ELSE [claire.speech(Oh, hello again, [pc.name]!)] Claire cheerfully exclaims as she sees that it's you who's calling out to her, [claire.speech(What can I do for you this time?)] #ENDIF

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_claireAskedWarehouseEscape))

Before you can answer, the busty cat-girl suddenly steps up closer to you, and, batting her eyelids, she seductively whispers, [claire.speech(You know, that storeroom behind me would be the perfect place to go and have a quick fuck... We'd probably not be discovered in there...)]

#ENDIF

[pc.speech(I was wondering if you could tell me a little more about Submission, and the people who live down here,)] you say.

[claire.speech(Of course!)] Claire happily replies, [claire.speech(You know, not many people really ask about that sort of thing, but I so happen to be an expert on Submission history and customs!)]

You can't help but smile as the small cat-girl proudly pushes her huge breasts out and places her hands on her absurdly wide hips, before starting, [claire.speech(There are five main types of residents down here; rat-morphs, alligator-morphs, slimes, imps, and bat-morphs. That's not to say those are the only races down here, however. You can find all the same races as you would up in Dominion, but it's those five who make up the vast majority of the population. Out of all of those, it's only the imps who are invariably troublesome. You get good and bad in all the other groups of Submission society, but I've yet to hear of an imp who cares about something other than causing mischief or having sex.)]

You can tell from the shift in tone of her voice that even the mention of imps is getting Claire annoyed, and you can only imagine how much trouble they must cause for the Enforcers down here. Before you can say anything to steer the conversation in a different direction, however, she quickly moves on, [claire.speech(Anyway, the imps stick to the tunnels, which are also filled with muggers, aggressive slimes, and all sorts of other unsavoury folk. You should always stick to the main walkways, where the majority of rat and alligator-morphs make their home. The alligators prefer to use the water ways to travel throughout Submission, while the rat-morphs, just like all the other races, stick to the walkways.)]

[pc.speech(What about bat-morphs?)] you ask.

[claire.speech(Ah, yes, it's very rare for us to have to deal with any bat-morphs, as almost all of them stay down in the Bat Caverns. Thanks to their echolocation ability, they're not bothered by the dark, and have tunnelled out roosts up in the high ceilings of the caves down there,)] Claire replies, proudly smiling as she reels off all of this information. [claire.speech(About half of Submission's slime population lives down there as well. Apparently, they love the taste of the bioluminescent plants that thrive in some areas, and a lot of those slimes have eaten so much that their bodies have ended up glowing as well!)]

Having heard enough about Submission society, you thank Claire for the information.

[claire.speech(You're welcome! Is there anything else you needed?)] she cheerily asks.

[pc.speech(I wanted to ask you what you know about Lyssieth,)] you reply, noting how Claire's cheerful expression shifts into one of concern as she hears that name.

[claire.speech(Well, as you might already know, Lyssieth is the Elder Lilin who's in charge of all of Submission. We Enforcers work to uphold the general laws of Lilith's domain, but it's Lyssieth who's in charge of giving us any special rules to enforce,)] Claire explains, uncomfortably shifting about a little as she finishes talking. Her small movements cause her huge breasts to start swaying from side to side in a pendulous manner, and you can't help but glance at them as she continues, [claire.speech(You should keep away from her palace. Her guards operate outside of our authority, and won't hesitate to attack if they suspect you of anything.)]

[pc.speech(I'll be careful of them,)] you reply, before continuing, [pc.speech(but you mentioned Lyssieth setting special rules; what are those?)]

Claire starts fidgeting even more as you ask that question, but despite her discomfort, she answers you, [claire.speech(Well, please don't go around telling anyone about this, but we've been told to ignore the anti-human laws that have been set in Dominion. You know, things like stopping and searching humans at random, and detaining them without reason for as long as we like.)]

[pc.speech(I see,)] you respond, [pc.speech(So Lyssieth's only special rule is not to discriminate against humans?)]

[claire.speech(Yes, but there aren't many humans living down here, so not many people know about this. Oh, and please don't go spreading this information. Everybody knows how much Lilith hates humans, and if she were to hear about this, I'm sure it'd be us, not Lyssieth, who gets punished,)] Claire mutters, before dropping back into her cheerful tone once again and asking, [claire.speech(Is there anything else I can help you with?)]

[pc.speech(I was wondering if you could tell me any more about those 'teleportation pads' you mentioned before? I've never seen anything like that up in Dominion.)]

Claire grins in delight as you mention the thing that she's most proud of, and immediately thrusts her disproportionately-large breasts out towards you as she proudly puffs up her chest and says, [claire.speech(I can tell you a little more, I suppose. I'm not really meant to talk too much about them, but it'd do some good to show a member of the public that we Enforcers aren't all bad! Basically, these teleportation pads allow me to instantly travel between the Enforcer posts down here in Submission in order to quickly relay messages. Being under-staffed down here, we don't have many demons who can use telepathy, so the higher-ups managed to get SWORD to give us some of their unused teleportation pads for long-range communications instead. You know, it's super rare for us Frontline Patrol units to get access to these kind of arcane devices; it's normally just SWORD or ORICL who get to use this kind of stuff.)]

[pc.speech(You must have worked hard in order to be chosen as the one to be using them then,)] you reply, hoping to encourage the proud cat-girl to reveal some more information about teleportation.

#IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_SLIME_QUEEN))

[claire.speech(Thank you, yes I did!)] she replies, letting out a happy, contented little sigh as she hears you recognising her hard work, [claire.speech(I really put everything I've got into this job, and it all paid off when I was the one chosen to have such an important assignment! Hey, you know what, how about I show you the pads some time? I can tell you're really interested in them, and seeing as you've helped us out with that slime queen problem, my superior is sure to give you special permission to see them!)]

After telling her that you'd be happy to take a look at the teleportation pads some time when she's free, Claire smiles happily at you and exclaims, [claire.speech(Great! Just tell me whenever you're ready!)]

#ELSE

[claire.speech(Thank you, yes I did!)] she replies, letting out a happy, contented little sigh as she hears you recognising her hard work, [claire.speech(I really put everything I've got into this job, and it all paid off when I was the one chosen to have such an important assignment! I'd love to show you the teleportation pads some time, but I really don't think my superior will give you permission...)]

Coming to the end of her explanation about teleportation, Claire smiles happily at you and asks, [claire.speech(So, is there anything else you wanted, [pc.name]?)]

[style.italicsMinorBad(You will be unable to visit the teleportation pads until you've completed the 'Slime Queen' side quest.)]

[pc.speech(You mentioned 'SWORD' and 'ORICL' when talking about the teleportation pads before,)] you say, [pc.speech(Could you tell me more about them?)]

#IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_TELEPORTATION)) [claire.speech(Well, after that business in their warehouse, I think you already know enough about SWORD,)] Claire replies with sigh, [claire.speech(But just to give you a rundown again, the 'Special Weapons and Operations Response Department' are the ones who get all the heavy weapons and dangerous assignments. They're the guys who deal with stuff like hostage rescue, tracking down serious criminals, and conducting raids on criminal hideouts. They've got a pretty well-earned reputation for being trigger-happy, and it's us Frontline Patrol units who end up getting all the flak from members of the public when we have to go in and clean up after they've finished their operations...)] #ELSE [claire.speech(Yeah, of course,)] Claire replies, [claire.speech(The 'Special Weapons and Operations Response Department', just as their name suggests, are the ones who get all the heavy weapons and dangerous assignments. They're the guys who deal with stuff like hostage rescue, tracking down serious criminals, and conducting raids on criminal hideouts. They've got a pretty well-earned reputation for being trigger-happy, and it's us Frontline Patrol units who end up getting all the flak from members of the public when we have to go in and clean up after they've finished their operations...)] #ENDIF

[pc.speech(And ORICL?)] you ask.

[claire.speech(Hmm, yeah, the 'Office of Realm Intelligence, Counter-Espionage, and Logistics'... Best not to ask too many questions about them,)] Claire replies, putting her hands on her hips and letting out a little huff, [claire.speech(An all-demon branch of the Enforcers, they're the guys who pay you a visit in the middle of the night, and then you're never seen again. As long as you don't start going around questioning Lilith's rule, or doing anything subversive against her rule, then you don't really need to worry about them.)]

Thanking Claire for the information, you wonder what to ask her next...

With the thought of the five-thousand flame reward on your mind, you report, [pc.speech(I've got some information on the slimes that are transforming people out in Submission's tunnels.)]

[claire.speech(I knew you'd ignore my warnings and go into there!)] Claire replies as she angrily wags her finger at you, before dropping her hands back down to her hips and sighing, [claire.speech(But if you managed to get some useful information out of it, then please do tell! That reward is still available.)]

[pc.speech(Well, when I encountered one of those slimes, they mentioned that they were transforming people due to following orders from a 'Slime Queen'. They even mentioned something about a quota of having to transform five people a day,)] you explain, recollecting what the slime said when you first encountered them.

[claire.speech(Hmm... A Slime Queen...)] Claire mutters, before starting to pace back and forth. You can't help but notice the way her massive hips and huge breasts rhythmically sway from side to side as she struts back and forth, and look on in amusement as you notice that the other Enforcers are all giving her a wide berth. [claire.speech(You know, we'd heard rumours of a slime calling herself a Queen before, but we've scoured every last [unit.size] of the tunnels, and haven't found any trace of her.)]

[pc.speech(Perhaps she isn't in the tunnels?)] you offer.

[claire.speech(Well, that's no good for us then,)] Claire sighs, stopping in front of you and placing her hands on her hips once more. [claire.speech(We're only authorised to patrol the tunnels and walkways. The only place where a Slime Queen could be hiding - if one even exists, that is - would be down in the Bat Caverns. We simply don't have the manpower to patrol down there, so who knows what could be hiding away down there in the dark...)]

[pc.speech(So you want me to go down there and find evidence of the Slime Queen?)] you ask, guessing where this conversation is headed.

[claire.speech(What? No! It's far too dangerous!)] Claire quickly replies, flustered by your response. [claire.speech(There are bat-morphs which can swoop down on you at any moment, aggressive slimes who'd just love to attack you, and the whole place is completely pitch-black! Well, there are patches of bioluminescent fungi, but it's still really dark and scary down there!)]

[pc.speech(Well, if I were to go down there and find a Slime Queen, that'd help you out, right?)] you ask, ignoring Claire's warnings.

[claire.speech(Well, I suppose so, yes... I don't like to tell anyone, as I don't want to encourage people to seek out danger, but we do have a twenty-thousand flame reward for anyone who's able to put an end to this slime transformation problem.)] Claire says, wringing her hands with worry. [claire.speech(So if you're able to find and convince this Queen to stop, you'll have earned that reward. But please don't go looking for danger down there! I need to get back on with work now, but promise me you'll be careful before I go!)]

[pc.speech(Don't worry so much,)] you reply, [pc.speech(I'm always careful.)]

With a sigh of relief, Claire turns and rushes off to fetch your five-thousand flame reward, leaving you wondering whether it'd be worth risking a visit to the Bat Caverns. After all, if you were able to find and subdue this 'Slime Queen', you'd earn twenty-thousand flames. before you're able to decide what to do about this new information, Claire returns to deliver your reward, and after handing the flames over to you, she asks, [claire.speech(So, is there anything else I can help you with?)]

Wanting to report on your success with dealing with the Slime Queen, you say, [pc.speech(I should probably let you know that I've recently been down into the Bat Caverns, and I was able to find the Slime Queen down there...)]

[claire.speech(Y-You what?!)] Claire shouts, puffing up her chest and wagging a finger at you. [claire.speech(I told you that was too dangerous!)]

[pc.speech(Well, dangerous or not, I did as you asked,)] you reply, holding up the Slime Queen's crown for Claire to see. [pc.speech(I put an end to her plans of transforming everyone in Submission to slimes, and I brought her crown back as proof.)]

[claire.speech(Really? She actually existed? And you managed to stop her?)] Claire asks, returning her hands to her hips once more. [claire.speech(That's amazing... Where did you find her?)]

[pc.speech(She's living in a tower, built on an island in the middle of an underground lake,)] you reply. [pc.speech(She said that she doesn't have any way to contact the people who claim to be her subjects, so she can't ask them to stop. She did, however, promise to stop producing those transformative 'Biojuice Canisters'.)]

[claire.speech(You've been such a huge help,)] Claire sighs, [claire.speech(With the sheer number of new cases of forced slime transformations, we were close to breaking point. You've no idea how much this is going to help us out. Let me get that reward I promised!)]

You watch as Claire hurries off into one of the back rooms, and, just a moment later, returns with a bag of coins in her hand. [claire.speech(Here you are!)] she squeaks, [claire.speech(Thank you so much, [pc.name]!)]

[pc.speech(You're welcome,)] you reply, smiling at the little cat-girl.

Wanting to make your fictitious report that the Slime Queen has been dealt with, you say, [pc.speech(I should probably let you know that I've recently been down into the Bat Caverns, and I was able to find the Slime Queen down there...)]

[claire.speech(Y-You what?!)] Claire shouts, puffing up her chest and wagging a finger at you. [claire.speech(I told you that was too dangerous!)]

[pc.speech(Well, dangerous or not, I did as you asked,)] you reply, holding up the Slime Queen's crown for Claire to see. [pc.speech(I put an end to her plans of transforming everyone in Submission to slimes, and I brought her crown back as proof.)]

[claire.speech(Really? She actually existed? And you managed to stop her?)] Claire asks, returning her hands to her hips once more. [claire.speech(That's amazing... Where did you find her?)]

[pc.speech(She was hiding in one of those bioluminescent mushroom caverns,)] you lie, not wanting the Enforcers to find Catherine. [pc.speech(You're welcome,)] you reply, smiling at the little cat-girl.

Thinking that it would be a good idea to hear Claire's opinion of Vengar, you ask her if she's aware of the fact that he's leading a criminal gang, and if there's anything the Enforcers are doing to stop him.

[claire.speech(Yes, of course I'm aware of Vengar,)] the busty cat-girl sighs, [claire.speech(And no, there's nothing we can do to stop him; frontline patrol units aren't equipped to directly confront gangs like his, and we don't have the manpower to guard the premises he's extorting for protection money. There's really nothing we can do about him.)]

[pc.speech(So I wouldn't get any help if I were to go into his hideout and confront him?)] you ask, revealing your intentions.

[claire.speech(Excuse me?!)] Claire exclaims, puffing up her chest and wagging a finger as she scolds you, [claire.speech(You'd better not be serious about that! Do you realise how dangerous Vengar is?! There's no way you're actually thinking about trying to confront him, right?!)]

Replying that you are in fact serious about wanting to put a stop to Vengar's criminal activities, you watch as Claire pouts and places her hands on her hips, before letting out a weary sigh and revealing, [claire.speech(If you're really, truly serious about all this, then there is something that I can do to help. I'll need to run it by the Inspector first, though, so just wait here, ok?)]

Agreeing to wait for her return, you watch Claire hurry off to a door marked 'Inspector Powell', before knocking on it and stepping inside. After an uneventful five minutes, she eventually steps back out of the office, and with her huge breasts bouncing up and down, she rushes back over towards you.

[claire.speech(Ok, I got permission to give you some help,)] she reveals, [claire.speech(but under the condition that this is all off the record, ok? If we manage to capture Vengar, we can't offer you a reward or anything...)]

Curious to hear what kind of help Claire is willing to offer, you tell her that you're ok with not getting any official recognition, before asking what she has in mind.

[claire.speech(This is meant to be classified information, but seeing as you might be able to provide us with a unique opportunity, and also due to the fact that I vouched for you, the Inspector is allowing me to tell you this,)] Claire reveals, before stepping closer to you and lowering her voice, [claire.speech(There's been a SWORD unit waiting to launch a raid on the Rat Warrens for a couple of weeks now, but they're only interested in capturing Vengar himself, and so they're waiting for confirmation that he's inside before assaulting the place. If they were to raid the place and fail to find Vengar, he'd be sure to take precautions against ever being found again...)]

[pc.speech(So you want me to find out if he's in there for you?)] you ask, picking up on what it is Claire is about to ask you.

[claire.speech(That's right,)] she confirms, before reaching into a pouch on her vest and producing a small, dark-purple sphere. Handing it towards you, she says, [claire.speech(This is a basic resonance stone, calibrated to send a signal to the one in the SWORD unit's possession. These are normally illegal for citizens to possess, let alone use, but you have special permission from the Inspector. Just twist the two halves in opposite directions to activate it. Oh, and obviously only use it once you're in the Rat Warrens and have confirmed that Vengar is inside, ok?)]

Taking the resonance stone from Claire, you see that there's a shallow groove running the entire way around its circumference, effectively splitting the sphere into two halves. Telling the busty cat-girl that you understand how it works, you put it away into your inventory.

[claire.speech(The Inspector told me that the response time for the SWORD squad is going to be about five to ten minutes, so just buy some time after activating the stone, and they'll come to help you deal with Vengar as soon as they can,)] Claire further explains, [claire.speech(Oh, and show them the stone when they arrive, so that they don't arrest you by mistake...)]

Thanking Claire, and with nothing more on the matter to discuss, you wonder what to do next...

Wanting to take a look at the teleportation pads, you say, [pc.speech(I was hoping to take you up on your offer of showing me those teleportation pads,)] you explain.

[claire.speech(Oh, of course!)] the happy Enforcer replies, proudly puffing up her chest and placing her hands on her absurdly-wide hips as she continues, [claire.speech(I've got permission from the higher-ups to show you them, but on one condition!)]

[pc.speech(What's that?)] you ask.

[claire.speech(That you let your friends know that we Enforcers aren't all bad,)] Claire reveals, letting out a playful giggle. Even her armoured vest isn't enough to contain the heaving of her huge, [claire.cupSize]-cup breasts as she lets out this burst of mirthful laughter, and more than a couple of heads turn your way to witness the show that the busty cat-girl is inadvertently putting on. Seemingly oblivious to the people staring at her chest, she turns on the spot and starts walking towards a nearby door, calling over her shoulder as she goes, [claire.speech(Come on, [pc.name]. They're through here!)]

Doing as she asks, you follow in Claire's footsteps and head through the nearby door, which you notice is marked as 'Enforcers Only'. Instead of housing the teleportation pads, as you'd expected, the room beyond turns out to be a normal old office. A very bored-looking wolf-girl Enforcer is sitting behind a desk on the right-hand side of the room, and as the two of you enter, she sighs, [genericFemale.speech(Hey, Claire. Is that the visitor here to see the pads?)]
